content.description: Source: Miller, Warren E. Donald R. Kinder. Steven J. Rosenstone, and National Election Studies. Amencan National Election Study, 1992 Pre and Post-Election Survey (Enhanced with 1990 and 1991 Data]. ICPSR06067-V2. content.question: According to the bar graph, what percentage of children remain Independent/Non-partisan if their parents do not have a consistent orientation toward either party?
